A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Watching this movie in the cinema is a experience and that's why I'm giving it this rating. I couldn't really find any substance to the movie with all the plot holes and gaps in logically story telling.

That being said\, I can see how people enjoyed this movie for the cinematography\, the visuals and sounds were on point.

That's not enough to get me to rewatch it and that's how I know a movie is good\, when I leave the theatre I have a feeling that I wouldn't mind paying admission again to go back and see another screening.

The best analogy for this movie would be going on a blind date with a very beautiful woman\, you're excited at the beginning but as the date goes on you slowly find out that she has no personality and it completely superficial.
